name: 3MOJI - 3D Illustrations Pack (Community)
description:
Free 3D EMOJIS v1.0 illustrations by arfy

Level up your next project with our 3D Emojis ! Ideal for websites, apps, social media, or marketing. A huge variety of icons from smiling faces to rainbow, fruits, and robot. A really good choice for promo and social marketing strategies.


All our graphics are free to use. We will appreciate if you set a link to arfy.ca wherever you use them.
